posts.post_content:
Hello fellow board members. 

I am interested in working on my T206 collection and would like to explore trade possibilities with anyone who may have interest. One thing net54 never fails to deliver on is action and conversation.

As far as condition is concerned, I am not too picky when all is said and done, though I most likely would not be interested in a "beater". If it is necessary for cash to be involved, that is fine as well.

I am currently interested in adding the following subjects, with the following backs:

Walter Johnson "Portrait" ... Brown Hindu
Cy Young "Portrait" ... Brown Hindu
Ty Cobb "Bat Off" ... El Principe or Tolstoi
Nap Lajoie "With Bat" ... El Principe or Tolstoi

A few pieces which I have available in trade:

Tris Speaker ... Carolina Brights
Johnny Evers "Chicago" ... Broad Leaf 350
Orval Overall "Hands at face, yellow sunset" ... Uzit
Al Bridwell "Portrait, with cap" ... Lenox
Chief Bender "Portrait" ... El Principe De Gales
Hal Chase "Portrait, blue" ... El Principe De Gales
Matty McIntyre ... Cycle
etc.

If you have a potential match and are interested in possibly working a deal out, please feel free to send me a PM. I have scans available upon request.

Thank you very much.

Derek :eek:
